Structs/TimeSignature.html#/s:11MusicThe.name: init(beats:noteValue:)
Structs/TimeSignature.html#/s:11MusicThe.abstract: Initilizes the time signature with beats per measure and the value of the notes in beat.

Structs/TimeSignature.html#/s:11MusicThe.name: init(beats:division:)
Structs/TimeSignature.html#/s:11MusicThe.abstract: Initilizes the time signature with beats per measure and the value of the notes in beat. Returns nil if a division is not match a NoteValue.

Structs/Tempo.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Temp.name: init(timeSignature:bpm:)
Structs/Tempo.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Temp.abstract: Initilizes tempo with time signature and BPM.

Structs/Tempo.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Temp.name: duration(of:)
Structs/Tempo.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Temp.abstract: Caluclates the duration of a note value in seconds.

Structs/Tempo.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Temp.name: sampleLength(of:sampleRate:)
Structs/Tempo.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Temp.abstract: Calculates the note length in samples. Useful for sequencing notes sample accurate in the DSP.

Structs/Tempo.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Temp.name: hertz(of:)
Structs/Tempo.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Temp.abstract: Calculates the LFO speed of a note vaule in hertz.

Structs/Chord.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Chor.name: init(type:key:inversion:)
Structs/Chord.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Chor.abstract: Initilizes chord with root note and type.

Structs/Chord.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Chor.name: pitches(octave:)
Structs/Chord.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Chor.abstract: Generates notes of the chord for octave.

Structs/Chord.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Chor.name: pitches(octaves:)
Structs/Chord.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Chor.abstract: Generates notes of the chord for octave range.

Structs/Chord.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Chor.name: romanNumeric(for:)
Structs/Chord.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Chor.abstract: Returns the roman numeric string for a chord.

Structs/ChordType.html#/s:11MusicTheory9.name: third
Structs/ChordType.html#/s:11MusicTheory9.abstract: Thirds part. Second note of the chord.

Structs/ChordType.html#/s:11MusicTheory9.name: fifth
Structs/ChordType.html#/s:11MusicTheory9.abstract: Fifths part. Third note of the chord.

Structs/ChordType.html#/s:11MusicTheory9.name: init(third:fifth:sixth:seventh:suspended:extensions:)
Structs/ChordType.html#/s:11MusicTheory9.abstract: Initilze the chord type with its parts.

Structs/ChordType.html#/s:11MusicTheory9.name: init(intervals:)
Structs/ChordType.html#/s:11MusicTheory9.abstract: Initilze the chord type with its intervals.

Structs/ChordExtensionType/ExtensionType.name: ninth
Structs/ChordExtensionType/ExtensionType.abstract: 9th chord. Second note of the chord, one octave up from root.

Structs/ChordExtensionType/ExtensionType.name: eleventh
Structs/ChordExtensionType/ExtensionType.abstract: 11th chord. Eleventh note of the chord, one octave up from root.

Structs/ChordExtensionType/ExtensionType.name: thirteenth
Structs/ChordExtensionType/ExtensionType.abstract: 13th chord. Sixth note of the chord, one octave up from root.

Structs/Interval/Quality.html#/s:11Music.name: notation
Structs/Interval/Quality.html#/s:11Music.abstract: Returns the notation of the interval quality.

Structs/Interval/Quality.html#/s:11Music.name: description
Structs/Interval/Quality.html#/s:11Music.abstract: Returns the name of the interval quality.

Structs/Interval.html#/s:11MusicTheory8I.name: init(quality:degree:semitones:)
Structs/Interval.html#/s:11MusicTheory8I.abstract: Initilizes the interval with its quality, degree and semitones.

Structs/Interval.html#/s:11MusicTheory8I.name: all
Structs/Interval.html#/s:11MusicTheory8I.abstract: All pre-defined intervals in a static array. You can filter it out with qualities, degrees or semitones.

Structs/NoteValue.html#/s:11MusicTheory9.name: type
Structs/NoteValue.html#/s:11MusicTheory9.abstract: Type that represents the duration of note.

Structs/NoteValue.html#/s:11MusicTheory9.name: init(type:modifier:)
Structs/NoteValue.html#/s:11MusicTheory9.abstract: Initilize the NoteValue with its type and optional modifier.

Structs/Pitch.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Pitc.name: key
Structs/Pitch.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Pitc.abstract: Key of the pitch like C, D, A, B with accidentals.

Structs/Pitch.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Pitc.name: nearest(frequency:)
Structs/Pitch.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Pitc.abstract: This function returns the nearest pitch to the given frequency in Hz.

Structs/Pitch.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Pitc.name: frequency
Structs/Pitch.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Pitc.abstract: Calculates and returns the frequency of note on octave based on its location of piano keys.

Structs/Pitch.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Pitc.name: init(rawValue:)
Structs/Pitch.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Pitc.abstract: Initilizes the pitch with an integer value that represents the MIDI note number of the pitch.

Structs/Pitch.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Pitc.name: init(integerLiteral:)
Structs/Pitch.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Pitc.abstract: Initilizes the pitch with an integer value that represents the MIDI note number of the pitch.

Structs/Pitch.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Pitc.name: description
Structs/Pitch.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Pitc.abstract: Converts Pitch to string with its key and octave.

Structs/ChordProgression.html#/s:11Music.name: init(nodes:)
Structs/ChordProgression.html#/s:11Music.abstract: Initilizes the chord progression with its nodes.

Structs/ChordProgression.html#/s:11Music.name: chords(for:harmonicField:inversion:)
Structs/ChordProgression.html#/s:11Music.abstract: Generates chord progression for a Scale with Scale.HarmonicField and optionally inverted chords.

Structs/Key/KeyType.html#/s:11MusicTheor.name: key(at:)
Structs/Key/KeyType.html#/s:11MusicTheor.abstract: Returns neighbour KeyType at distance away. Works on both directions.

Structs/Key/KeyType.html#/s:11MusicTheor.name: octaveDiff(for:isHigher:)
Structs/Key/KeyType.html#/s:11MusicTheor.abstract: Calculates the octave difference for a neighbouring KeyType at given interval away higher or lower.

Structs/Key/KeyType.html.name: KeyType
Structs/Key/KeyType.html.abstract: Base pitch of the key without accidentals. Accidentals will take account in the parent struct, Key. Integer values are based on C = 0 on western chromatic scale.

Structs/Key.html#/s:11MusicTheory3KeyV14.name: keysWithSharps
Structs/Key.html#/s:11MusicTheory3KeyV14.abstract: All notes in an octave with sharp notes.

Structs/Key.html#/s:11MusicTheory3KeyV13.name: keysWithFlats
Structs/Key.html#/s:11MusicTheory3KeyV13.abstract: All notes in an octave with flat notes.

Structs/Key.html#/s:11MusicTheory3KeyV4t.name: init(type:accidental:)
Structs/Key.html#/s:11MusicTheory3KeyV4t.abstract: Initilizes the key with its type and accidental.

Structs/Key.html#/s:11MusicTheory3KeyV11.name: description
Structs/Key.html#/s:11MusicTheory3KeyV11.abstract: Returns the key notation with its type and accidental, if has any.

Structs/Scale/HarmonicField.html#/s:11Mu.name: triad
Structs/Scale/HarmonicField.html#/s:11Mu.abstract: First, third and fifth degree notes builds a triad chord.

Structs/Scale/HarmonicField.html#/s:11Mu.name: tetrad
Structs/Scale/HarmonicField.html#/s:11Mu.abstract: First, third, fifth and seventh notes builds a tetrad chord.

Structs/Scale/HarmonicField.html#/s:11Mu.name: ninth
Structs/Scale/HarmonicField.html#/s:11Mu.abstract: First, third, fifth, seventh and ninth notes builds a 9th chord.

Structs/Scale/HarmonicField.html#/s:11Mu.name: eleventh
Structs/Scale/HarmonicField.html#/s:11Mu.abstract: First, third, fifth, seventh, ninth and eleventh notes builds a 11th chord.

Structs/Scale/HarmonicField.html#/s:11Mu.name: thirteenth
Structs/Scale/HarmonicField.html#/s:11Mu.abstract: First, third, fifth, seventh, ninth, eleventh and thirteenth notes builds a 13th chord.

Structs/Scale.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Scal.name: type
Structs/Scale.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Scal.abstract: Type of the scale that has interval info.

Structs/Scale.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Scal.name: key
Structs/Scale.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Scal.abstract: Root key of the scale that will built onto.

Structs/Scale.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Scal.name: init(type:key:)
Structs/Scale.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Scal.abstract: Initilizes the scale with its type and key.

Structs/Scale.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Scal.name: keys
Structs/Scale.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Scal.abstract: Keys generated by the intervals of the scale.

Structs/Scale.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Scal.name: pitches(octave:)
Structs/Scale.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Scal.abstract: Generates Pitch array of scale in given octave.

Structs/Scale.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Scal.name: pitches(octaves:)
Structs/Scale.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Scal.abstract: Generates Pitch array of scale in given octaves.

Structs/Scale.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Scal.name: pitches(octaves:)
Structs/Scale.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Scal.abstract: Generates Pitch array of scale in given octaves.

Structs/Scale/HarmonicField.html.name: HarmonicField
Structs/Scale/HarmonicField.html.abstract: Stack of notes to generate chords for each note in the scale.

Structs/Scale.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Scal.name: harmonicField(for:inversion:)
Structs/Scale.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Scal.abstract: Generates chords for harmonic field of scale.

Structs/Scale.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Scal.name: description
Structs/Scale.html#/s:11MusicTheory5Scal.abstract: Converts Scale to string with its key and type.

Structs/ScaleType.html#/s:11MusicTheory9.name: init(intervals:description:)
Structs/ScaleType.html#/s:11MusicTheory9.abstract: Initilize the scale with series of its intervals.
Checks the equability between two ScaleTypes by their intervals.

Structs/ScaleType.html.name: ScaleType
Structs/ScaleType.html.abstract: Represents scale by the intervals between note sequences.

Structs/Scale.html.name: Scale
Structs/Scale.html.abstract: Scale object with ScaleType and scale’s key of NoteType.

Structs/Key.html.name: Key
Structs/Key.html.abstract: Represents the keys that notes and pitches are based on.

Structs/ChordProgression.html.name: ChordProgression
Structs/ChordProgression.html.abstract: Chord progression enum that you can create hard-coded and custom progressions.

Structs/Pitch.html.name: Pitch
Structs/Pitch.html.abstract: Pitch object with a Key and an octave.

Structs/NoteValue.html.name: NoteValue
Structs/NoteValue.html.abstract: Defines the duration of a note beatwise.

Structs/ChordSixthType.html.name: ChordSixthType
Structs/ChordSixthType.html.abstract: Defiens sixth chords. If you add the sixth note, you have sixth chord.

Structs/ChordType.html.name: ChordType
Structs/ChordType.html.abstract: Defines full type of chord with all chord parts.

Structs/Chord.html.name: Chord
Structs/Chord.html.abstract: Defines a chord with a root note and type.

Structs/Tempo.html.name: Tempo
Structs/Tempo.html.abstract: Defines the tempo of the music with beats per second and time signature.

Structs/TimeSignature.html.name: TimeSignature
Structs/TimeSignature.html.abstract: Defines how many beats in a measure with which note value.

Protocols/ChordDescription.html.name: ChordDescription
Protocols/ChordDescription.html.abstract: Protocol that defines a printable chord part.

Functions.html#/s:11MusicTheory2eeoiySbA.abstract: Checks the equability between two Scales by their base key and notes.
Checks if two Key types are equal in terms of their int values.

Functions.html#/s:11MusicTheory3eeeoiySb.abstract: Checks if two Key types are equal in terms of their type and accidental values.

Functions.html#/s:11MusicTheory1poiyAA10.abstract: Returns a new accidental by adding up two accidentals in the equation.

Functions.html#/s:11MusicTheory1soiyAA10.abstract: Returns a new accidental by substracting two accidentals in the equation.

Functions.html#/s:11MusicTheory1poiyAA10.abstract: Returns a new accidental by adding up an int to the accidental in the equation.

Functions.html#/s:11MusicTheory1soiyAA10.abstract: Returns a new accidental by substracting an int from the accidental in the equation.

Functions.html#/s:11MusicTheory2eeoiySbA.abstract: Checks if the two accidental is identical in terms of their halfstep values.

Functions.html#/s:11MusicTheory3eeeoiySb.abstract: Checks if the two accidental is exactly identical.

Functions.html#/s:11MusicTheory1poiyAA5P.abstract: Returns the pitch above target interval from target pitch.

Functions.html#/s:11MusicTheory1soiyAA5P.abstract: Returns the pitch below target interval from target pitch.

Functions.html#/s:11MusicTheory2eeoiySbA.abstract: Compares the equality of two pitches by their MIDI note value.

Functions.html#/s:11MusicTheory3eeeoiySb.abstract: Compares the exact equality of two pitches by their keys and octaves.

Functions.html#/s:11MusicTheory1loiySbAA.abstract: Compares two Pitches in terms of their semitones.

Functions.html#/s:11MusicTheory1doiySdAA.abstract: Calculates how many notes of a single NoteValueType is equivalent to a given NoteValue.

Functions.html#/s:11MusicTheory2eeoiySbA.abstract: Checks the equality of two Intervals in terms of their semitones.

Functions.html#/s:11MusicTheory3eeeoiySb.abstract: Checks the equality of two Intervals in terms of their quality, degree and semitones.

Functions.html#/s:11MusicTheory2eeoiySbA.abstract: Checks the equability between two ChordTypes by their intervals.
Checks the equability between two chords by their base key and notes.

Enums/ChordSuspendedType.html#/s:11Music.name: sus2
Enums/ChordSuspendedType.html#/s:11Music.abstract: Second note of chord instead of third part. 2 halfsteps between root.

Enums/ChordSuspendedType.html#/s:11Music.name: sus4
Enums/ChordSuspendedType.html#/s:11Music.abstract: Fourth note of chord instead of third part. 5 halfsteps between root.

Enums/ChordSeventhType.html#/s:11MusicTh.name: major
Enums/ChordSeventhType.html#/s:11MusicTh.abstract: Seventh note of the chord. 11 halfsteps between root.

Enums/ChordSeventhType.html#/s:11MusicTh.name: dominant
Enums/ChordSeventhType.html#/s:11MusicTh.abstract: Halfstep down of seventh note. 10 halfsteps between root.

Enums/NoteModifier.html#/s:11MusicTheory.name: quintuplet
Enums/NoteModifier.html#/s:11MusicTheory.abstract: Five of the indicated note value total the duration normally occupied by four.

Enums/Accidental.html#/s:11MusicTheory10.name: flats(amount:)
Enums/Accidental.html#/s:11MusicTheory10.abstract: Reduces the Key or Pitch value amount of halfsteps.

Enums/Accidental.html#/s:11MusicTheory10.name: sharps(amount:)
Enums/Accidental.html#/s:11MusicTheory10.abstract: Increases the Key or Pitch value amount of halfsteps.

Enums/Accidental.html#/s:11MusicTheory10.name: flat
Enums/Accidental.html#/s:11MusicTheory10.abstract: Reduces the Key or Pitch value one halfstep below.

Enums/Accidental.html#/s:11MusicTheory10.name: sharp
Enums/Accidental.html#/s:11MusicTheory10.abstract: Increases the Key or Pitch value one halfstep above.

Enums/Accidental.html#/s:11MusicTheory10.name: doubleFlat
Enums/Accidental.html#/s:11MusicTheory10.abstract: Reduces the Key or Pitch value amount two halfsteps below.

Enums/Accidental.html#/s:11MusicTheory10.name: doubleSharp
Enums/Accidental.html#/s:11MusicTheory10.abstract: Increases the Key or Pitch value two halfsteps above.

Enums/Accidental.html#/s:11MusicTheory10.name: shouldUseDoubleFlatAndDoubleSharpNotation
Enums/Accidental.html#/s:11MusicTheory10.abstract: A flag for description function that determines if it should use double sharp and double flat symbols.

Enums/Accidental.html#/s:11MusicTheory10.name: rawValue
Enums/Accidental.html#/s:11MusicTheory10.abstract: Value of the accidental in terms of halfsteps.

Enums/Accidental.html#/s:11MusicTheory10.name: init(rawValue:)
Enums/Accidental.html#/s:11MusicTheory10.abstract: Initilizes the accidental with an integer that represents the halfstep amount.

Enums/Accidental.html#/s:11MusicTheory10.name: init(integerLiteral:)
Enums/Accidental.html#/s:11MusicTheory10.abstract: Initilizes the accidental with an integer literal value.

Enums/Accidental.html#/s:11MusicTheory10.name: notation
Enums/Accidental.html#/s:11MusicTheory10.abstract: Returns the notation string of the accidental.

Enums/Accidental.html#/s:11MusicTheory10.name: description
Enums/Accidental.html#/s:11MusicTheory10.abstract: Returns the notation string of the accidental. Returns empty string if accidental is natural.

Enums/ChordProgressionNode.html#/s:11Mus.name: next
Enums/ChordProgressionNode.html#/s:11Mus.abstract: Meaningful next nodes, useful for a recommendation engine.

Enums/ChordProgressionNode.html#/s:11Mus.name: description
Enums/ChordProgressionNode.html#/s:11Mus.abstract: Returns roman numeric string of the node.

Enums/ChordProgressionNode.html.name: ChordProgressionNode
Enums/ChordProgressionNode.html.abstract: A node of chord progression in intervals.

Enums/Accidental.html.name: Accidental
Enums/Accidental.html.abstract: The enum used for calculating values of the Keys and Pitches.

Enums/ChordThirdType.html.name: ChordThirdType
Enums/ChordThirdType.html.abstract: Defines third part of the chord. Second note after the root.

Enums/ChordFifthType.html.name: ChordFifthType
Enums/ChordFifthType.html.abstract: Defines fifth part of the chord. Third note after root note.

Enums/ChordSeventhType.html.name: ChordSeventhType
Enums/ChordSeventhType.html.abstract: Defiens seventh chords. If you add seventh note, you have seventh chord.
